channel.title: geocaching on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in geocaching on Barefoot Rob

item.title: nihongo-tftc-glwbkt13
item.description: 15:46 Friday 13 July 2018 JST From geocaching log GLWBKT13: 設置ありがとうございます😊。 初ハイドはどんなキャッシュなのかなと楽しみに、GBの熾烈なFTF争いのあとを見に来ました。

item.title: tftc glwbarqw and glwbay3f
item.description: 09:30 Friday 13 July 2018 JST From geocaching log GLWBARQW: Found it ! TFTC& STF thanks :-) 初ハイドおめでとうございます。(^^) ちょっとウロウロしましたが見つける事が出来ました。 熱中症予防に水分補給を忘れずにというメッセージかもね。 これからも どうぞよろしくお願い致します。 素敵な所にcacheの設置ありがとうございます😊 thanks :-) happy geocaching:-) From Turbo-7’s geocaching log GLWBAY3F: Found it. TFTC! Thanks (FTF) . Congratulations on your first hide cache! 初ハイドおめでとうございます。キャッシュの名前のとおり緑地公園前ですね。 すてきな場所にキャッシュ設置ありがとうございます。

item.title: geocache dekita
item.description: 10:17 Sunday 24 June 2018 JST 昨日、初めのジオキャッシュを作って隠した。 Yesterday I made my first geocache and hid it. https://geocaching.comで登録したけど、まだハンネイしていない。I registered it on https://geocaching.com, but it hasn’t been published yet. 先輩は新しキャッシュを確認してハンネイします。 Some senior member will check it and then publish the cache online.

item.title: mak^Hde first geocache
item.description: 11:26 Saturday 23 June 2018 JST I plan to placed my first geocache today. I got support from Turbo-7, who sent me links to English and Japanese notes to place on the cache. I tweaked the notes to include my email address, but have not put them online yet because they break the CSS of my site when displayed in the index, and I cannot figure out how to override the Hugo index the way I want.

item.title: walked around town with Lin
item.description: 18:14 Thursday 03 May 2018 JST Walked with Lin to the “bread festival” near our station. It was basically ten tables with some pastries / cookies, most of which were individually wrapped; none of which seemed different than what I could buy in a convenience store. I took another pic of .. hmm maybe I can make a page for these on my journal site. or maybe a whole set of pages … (brain starts to run wild.
